(b) Paragraph 48 (b) relates to how the undertaking takes into account material impacts on
its strategy and business model. This information related to impacts can be disclosed at
a summarised level without all the granularity required by the datapoints therein.
(c) Paragraph 48 (c) to (h) sets requirements to disclose more detailed information about
